description: Opened in 1910, this historic restaurant with an attractive shaded outdoor pergola serves an extensive array of delicious local fish prepared in traditional recipes. Enjoy a selection of typical Sicilian specialities prepared by the Bernardi family, including the highly recommended “Nonno Filippino” fish soup.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Interesting wine list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace']
